Expected Result: Profile should be listed with customeproperties

Expected Result: List Profiles with profileId and tenantId

Expected Result: Create a block profile with all(Required + Optional) parameters

Expected Result: Create a file profile with required parameters

Feature Scenario: Create Profile name with Int Type
Description: Create Profile name with Int Type, ex: name=12345, It should not be string type

Feature Scenario: Create Profile name with empty size
Create Profile name with size 256 chrs
Create Profile name with pattern [A-Za-z0-9_-] only
Create Profile name with having special chars
Description: Create Profile name with having special chars ex: profile@~1##$

Feature Scenario: Create Profile with storageType as non-string datatype
Description: Create Profile with storageType as Int datatype, ex: storageType: 12345

Feature Scenario: Create Profile with storageType as non storage keyword
Description: Create Profile with storageType as non storage keyword, example: storageType=abc. (The actual storage keywords it supports are only: block,file,object)

Feature Scenario: Create Profile with description as non-string dataype
Description: add the description with int/float value etc.

Feature Scenario: Create Profile with provisioningProperties and datastorage and recoveryTimeObjective as non-int data type
Description: recoveryTimeObjective should be integer in sec. But try with non-int data type. For ex: recoveryTimeObjective:2.3

Feature Scenario: Create Profile with provisioningProperties and datastorage and provisioningPolicy as non-string data type
Description: provisioning ploicy should be string. But try with non-string dataType. with storage keywords [thick, thin]

Feature Scenario: Create Profile with provisioningProperties and datastorage and  compression as non-boolean data type
Create Profile with provisioningProperties and datastorage and deduplication as non-boolean data type
Create Profile with provisioningProperties and datastorage and characterCodeSet as non-string data type
Description: It should support some valid charactercodeSet ex: ASCII

Feature Scenario: Create Profile with provisioningProperties and datastorage and maxFileNameLengthBytes as non-int data type
Description: It supports maximum filename length in bytes, but try with some other data TYpe

Feature Scenario: Create Profile with provisioningProperties and datastorage and  storageAccessCapability as non-string data type
Description: storageAccessCapability should be string Type and only [Read, write, Execute]. but try with some other sting combination.

Feature Scenario: Create Profile with provisioningProperties and IOConnectivity and  accessProtocol as non-string data type
Create Profile with provisioningProperties and IOConnectivity and  accessProtocol as except from list [iscsi, rbd, fibre channel, or DSWare(Data Service Middleware), nvmeof, nfs]
Create Profile with provisioningProperties and IOConnectivity and  maxIOPS as non-int data type
Create Profile with provisioningProperties and IOConnectivity and  minIOPS as non-int data type
Create Profile with provisioningProperties and IOConnectivity and  maxBWS as non-int data type
Create Profile with provisioningProperties and IOConnectivity and minBWS as non-int data type
Create Profile with provisioningProperties and IOConnectivity and  latency as non-int data type

Description: [Valid Scenario] inputs: name: should follow regrex[a-z,A-Z,0-9,_,-] and length should be less than 255 chars, description: 'The volume test', size: 1, Example: name:"volume1"

1. Opensds (Hotpot) must be Installed and all processes running 
2. Block Profile must be created

Description: [Valid Scenario]  List all the pools using contraints

2. Block Profile must be created

[CLI] osdsctl pool list --limit=0
[CLI] osdsctl pool list --limit=100000
